channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: It’s 5 minutes to midnight for Germany’s economy, Bundesbank chief warns after central bank’s first loss in 45 years
item.description: The Bundesbank racked up its first loss since 1979, as president Joachim Nagel called on Germany's incoming government to save the economy.

item.title: Judge blocks Trump's pause on refugee admissions
item.description: A federal judge issued an injunction Tuesday halting President Trump's attempt to pause refugee admissions.

item.title: Germany Doubling Down on Democratic Deficits
item.description: In the wake of JD Vance’s challenge to be better democrats, Germany’s incoming chancellor does the opposite.

item.title: Exclusive: 57 Maine School Districts Hide Kids’ Gender Dysphoria From Parents
item.description: Democrat Maine Gov. Janet Mills is attempting to thwart federal civil rights law to allow the grooming of children in schools.

item.title: New poll finds about half of rural young people feel job market pressures in their hometowns
